hero.title: Mind over AI
hero.subtitle: The Value of Human Thinking
hero.description: The aim of this campaign is to promote human thinking and avoid overreliance on AI.

first.text1: In a world increasingly dominated by machines, the human mind remains our greatest asset. Embrace creativity and critical thinking.
first.text2: Join us in reclaiming our intellectual future. Support a movement that values human ingenuity and the power of thought.

second.text: Join us in reclaiming our intellectual future. Support a movement that values human ingenuity and the power of thought.

content.paragraph1: The world is getting taken over by Artificial Intelligence. This must be stopped. Humanity is losing its ability to think‚Äîfaster than we realize. Take a stand. Limit AI usage. Don't let AI take over your brain.
content.paragraph2: Every day, AI replaces jobs once held by humans. By 2025, 2 million factory jobs could vanish. By 2030, 375 million people might need to switch careers because of AI advancements. Seventy-five percent of CEOs say AI will change their businesses‚Äîmany jobs will disappear.

paper2.caption: Humans reclaiming their critical thinking skills.

Footer.aboutText: Waking people up to the power of their own minds.

AboutBusiness.harshRealityTitle: The Harsh Reality: A Bad Website is Worse Than No Website

Did you land on a website that looked outdated, took forever to load, or made it hard to find what you needed? You left. That‚Äôs exactly what happens when potential customers encounter a poorly designed website.

AboutBusiness.finalCallText: A bad website is costing you sales every single day. Don't let another customer slip away. Invest in a high-converting website today and watch your business soar.

AboutUs.title: About WEDIM AI
AboutUs.subtitle: Championing human intelligence over automation.
AboutUs.ourStoryText: Founded with a vision to reclaim the human mind, WEDIM AI was born out of a desire to counterbalance the rapid rise of artificial intelligence. Our journey began by putting humanity first.
AboutUs.ourMissionText: Our mission is to encourage critical thinking and creativity, empowering individuals to harness technology without losing their human touch.
AboutUs.ourValuesText: We value human intuition, creativity, and integrity. We believe that technology should serve humanity‚Äînot replace it.
AboutUs.ourPhilosophyText: We believe in striking a balance between leveraging technology and preserving the unique qualities of human thought. Every initiative is a step toward a more thoughtful future.
AboutUs.ourApproachText: Through community engagement, education, and innovative strategies, we inspire a culture that prioritizes human intellect in the digital age.
AboutUs.contactSubtitle: We'd love to hear from you! Reach out and let‚Äôs discuss how we can promote human thinking together.
